message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. Our product is a unique and valuable asset, and we believe it holds significant potential for enhancing your business operations. Given its importance and the benefits it can bring, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is a great opportunity to secure such an asset at a competitive rate, considering its worth to you is $800000. We look forward to discussing this further with you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but based on my assessment, I am only able to commit to a maximum of $850000 for the product. I understand that this may not meet your current expectations, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to engage in discussion. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on the asset and our commitment to finding a fair solution for both parties. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value you see in the product, I must stick to my budgetary constraints. I am willing to pay up to $860000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach a satisfactory agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $865000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that allows us to move forward with a transaction that is beneficial for both parties. I hope this meets your requirements and we can finalize the deal.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my financial considerations, I am able to commit to a maximum of $862500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can come to an agreement.
